messages.title: A strong voice for Lewisham East
messages.content: The General Election on May 7 will have huge consequences for our part of London. It's in areas like Lewisham East that the General Election and the future of our country will be decided.

issues.economy: The General Election is really important. We must develop a strong economy which benefits everyone - not just those at the top.
issues.health: She will protect our local NHS and stand up for those on modest incomes.

leaflet.personalStatement: When I was first elected to Parliament five years ago, I promised to be a hard-working and honest MP. I have taken time to listen to their concerns and try to help them. I have always been accessible and approachable and if I am re-elected to represent you, I will continue to be so.

contactInformation.address: The Talent Factory, 4-14 Barmeston Road, Catford SE6 3BH

images.caption: Cover image of the leaflet showing how to apply to vote by post and an image of Heidi Alexander.
